name: Veevaa
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday Veevaa Bajaj! This day is really precious to me .... some random shit
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to the girl who always makes me feel precious!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it or fuck off
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
